'''Primal Embers''' are an exploration mechanic found in the [[Great Red Sand]], [[Sumeru]].

They are energy aggregations that can be stored at [[Primal Sconce]]s, then unleashed and pursued to activate [[Primal Torch]]es. Since they are very fragile, they can be blown away by the strong winds generated by [[Large Fan Blades]].
